ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: I prefer the excitement of fear to running around aimlessly anyday. I went to fear for the first time this past weekend, and even though I died 7 times in 2
ygData.messageBody:
I prefer the excitement of fear to running around aimlessly anyday.

I went to fear for the first time this past weekend, and even though I died
7 times in 2 days, I had a blast. I even got boots out of the deal.(granted
efreeti boots are better, but I was wearing charred, so they are better than
what I had) The game has gotten kind of boring as of late and the plane of
fear adds a new and exciting twist to my playtime, I can't wait to go back
this weekend again.(no wonder I am still level 47, hehe)

I guess from my standpoint I can either, try and complete these quests which
gets me no experience at all, with no idea of what I will recieve OR I can
get XP in Lguk or SolB all week long, so I have a nice buffer for going to
fear on the weekends and potential for getting armor that I already know is
Whoop daddy.

Just my thoughts once again,

Bree Wyndsdale
